last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 6
last_episode_to_air.overview: Panariello's animal rights butcher proves fatal for someone, but many comedians are still in the game. Edoardo shows off his journalism skills in a parody newscast, while Veronika bursts into the studio once again to present her book... With little time left, everyone is starting to run out of energy to withstand these continuous "attacks." Who will be the new winner of LOL?

name: LOL: Last One Laughing Italy
overview: Is a comedy show where ten professional comedians face off for six hours in a row to keep a straight face, while they try to make their opponents laugh. The first time someone laughs the contestant gets warned, the second time, they get eliminated from the game. Whoever manages to resist without laughing all the way through the six hours wins EUR100,000 to turn over to the charity of their choice.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: In the first episode of LOL: Chi Ride è Fuori, the 10 comedian contestants enter the theater. Fedez, host and referee, explains the rules of the game and kicks off the challenge. He and co-host Mara Maionchi observe the various stages of the competition from the control room. The contestants start "attacking" each other with jokes and sketches, but for some, staying serious becomes harder than expected...

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: In the second episode of LOL: Chi Ride è Fuori, the competition heats up. Frank Matano pulls out a "lethal" object from his backpack, and Caterina Guzzanti transforms into one of her most famous characters… So far, there’s only been one warning, but as time goes on, staying focused and keeping a straight face becomes increasingly difficult for everyone.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Lillo, Frank, and Ciro use their superpowers to try to make the others laugh, while Elio performs on stage (and beyond...). It becomes particularly difficult for everyone to hold back their laughter, and indeed, it's time for the second elimination.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: The competition reaches its midpoint: after three hours, someone is reprimanded for passivity, while Pintus tries to unsettle his opponents with some new performances. Warnings and eliminations follow quickly, reducing the number of comedians still in the game.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Lillo showcases the power of his mind, Ciro reveals what American actors really say during interviews, while Elio uncovers what’s underneath the Mona Lisa’s clothes. Faced with these new "attacks," red cards are certainly not in short supply...

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: The six hours of gameplay are almost up, but between moments of pure sensuality, unexpected returns to the stage, and a "playful" transformation of Katia Follesa, more than one contestant will slip up and laugh. Who will be the winner of the first edition of LOL?

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: In the first episode of LOL: Chi ride è fuori, the 10 comedian contestants enter the theater. Fedez, host and referee, explains the rules of the game and kicks off the competition. He and Frank Matano will monitor the various stages of the challenge and point out those who laugh. The contestants begin to "attack" each other with jokes and sketches, but for some, staying serious proves more difficult than expected...

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: In the second episode of LOL: Chi ride è fuori, the competition heats up. Maccio and Maria showcase their impression skills; Mago Forest introduces the group to his loyal four-legged friend; and Alice hosts the LOL Awards... So far, there’s only been one warning, but staying serious is becoming increasingly difficult for everyone, especially when an unexpected guest, Lillo, makes his entrance into the theater!

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: In the third episode, the LOL contestants reveal their hidden talents: Virginia and Corrado establish a connection with the spirit world, Forest shines as a commercial spokesperson, while Maria proves to be an excellent majorette. Staying serious isn't easy, and Fedez has to continuously step in to show the yellow card.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: We're halfway through the competition: Virginia brings some "performances" of contemporary art to the stage, Gianmarco finds alternative ways to eat a watermelon, while Max challenges Maccio in a no-holds-barred wrestling match. Lillo engages everyone in a wild dance lesson, and after many warnings, the first elimination of the season finally arrives.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Corrado updates his legendary guide to the "Grande Raccordo Anulare," Tess dives into the character of a troubled mermaid, while Virginia reveals herself to the others like never before. And as Lillo brings a touch of Caribbean art to the theater, the contestants begin to lose the strength to resist these “attacks”: the control room, in fact, keeps filling up with those eliminated.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Maccio takes the stage with a live version of his greatest hits, while Virginia, as an eccentric make-up artist, listens to the confessions of a slightly confused Corrado, unsure about his origins... In the final hour of the game, Fedez and Frank call on Lillo and the already eliminated comedians for help. Who will win the 100,000 euro prize to be donated to charity?

episodes.name: Bonus Episode
episodes.overview: The laughter continues at LOL, even after the winner is announced: gags and never-before-seen performances make up this extra episode, dedicated to all those who wish LOL would never end.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: In the first episode, the 10 competing comedians make their entrance into the theater. Waiting for Fedez in the control room instead there is Frank Matano who has a very special surprise in store for him. The competition begins, but no one imagines an intruder is hiding inside the theater...

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: A sudden incursion surprises everyone: Maccio Capatonda, hidden in the theater, shows himself to the group creating havoc. Meanwhile, the race comes alive: Frassica organizes one of her quirky quizzes; Cevoli plays the famous character of the councilor; everyone is then ready to show off at the LOL Gala.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Marina makes "scratched" with her Natolia; Cristiano shows unexpected mentalist skills, while Fabio shows those as a psychologist. "I cugini merda" of Luca and Paolo instead attempt the path of provocation and as if that were not enough, a raid by Frank into the theater scatters the cards.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: A new raid by Maccio Capatonda in the guise of an unlikely super-hero. Nino organizes games giving away absurd prizes, Herbert prepares imaginative cocktails, Fabio brings us back to the atmosphere of Japanese souls, while the others "sing" them to the sound of rap ... After so many admonitions, they are all (or almost) at risk of elimination!

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: In the fifth episode of LOL, the remaining contestants have plenty of ideas to take down their opponents. Fabio continues his fight against Neapolitan stereotypes in a unique way, Luca and Paolo take us on a journey through a tourist village, while the "scientist" Herbert presents his crazy inventions. Amidst "delirium," impersonations, and gags, the number of eliminations is bound to increase!

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Marina transports us to the banks of the Seine with her existentialist singer, Herbert shows he has a nose for the news, while the "delirium" button brings more chaos to the theater. When Maccio gets everyone involved by staging one of his trailers, the contestants begin to lose the strength to hold out until the end. Who will win the 100,000 euro prize to be donated to charity?

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: The LOL theater is all set to welcome a new, incredible group of artists, ready to battle it out with jokes, sketches, impersonations, and gags. In the control room, as always, are Fedez and Frank Matano, this year joined by Lillo, who will assist them during the challenge. Fedez explains the rules, but just as he's about to kick off the competition, a big twist surprises everyone...

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: The challenge is in full swing, and the comedians are coming up with all sorts of tricks to make their opponents crack... and while Lastrico has found his favorite target, the others reveal their trump cards: Lucia Ocone with Veronika; Loris with his wild Lunanzio. Lillo also bursts into the theater for his first lesson in overacting. Staying serious is a real challenge, and indeed, the first yellow cards are handed out.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: In the third episode, the contestants have plenty of ideas to take down their opponents: Aurora gives life to a superheroine with improbable abilities, Panariello brings his Renato Zero to the stage, and Lucia presents a "wandering" Mina… between joke battles, games, and impersonations, holding back laughter becomes quite challenging for some, especially when Lillo arrives with another lesson...

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: In the fourth episode, the contestants "sing" to each other in a wacky musical challenge; Rocco Tanica opens a "cultural" segment with a unique press review; Angela Finocchiaro tries her hand at a special can-can. Even Fedez gets involved by using the "delirium" button… The number of warnings is bound to rise, as is the number of eliminations...

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Almost all the contestants are still in the game, but the risk of elimination is looming... Lucia tries to heat things up with an over-the-top influencer; Edoardo conducts couples therapy for the unlikely duo Santamaria-Fabiani; Tanica transforms into the cursed artist Mary the Immense. Lillo also puts everyone to the test with another surprise appearance... Holding back laughter is getting harder and harder!

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Panariello's animal rights butcher proves fatal for someone, but many comedians are still in the game. Edoardo shows off his journalism skills in a parody newscast, while Veronika bursts into the studio once again to present her book... With little time left, everyone is starting to run out of energy to withstand these continuous "attacks." Who will be the new winner of LOL?
